publications.title: SOS: Synthetic Object Segments Improve Detection, Segmentation, and Grounding
publications.tldr: We introduce a synthetic data generation pipeline that creates diverse object segments to improve detection, segmentation, and grounding performance across multiple vision tasks.

publications.title: Generate Any Scene: Evaluating and Improving Text-to-Vision Generation with Scene Graph Programming
publications.tldr: A scene graph programming framework that enables systematic evaluation and improvement of text-to-vision generation models through compositional scene construction.

publications.title: ProVision: Programmatically Scaling Vision-centric Instruction Data for Multimodal Language Models
publications.tldr: A programmatic approach to scale vision-centric instruction data generation for training more capable multimodal language models, featured in VentureBeat and MarkTechPost.

publications.title: Task Me Anything
publications.tldr: A comprehensive benchmark for evaluating multimodal models on diverse real-world tasks, with systematic evaluation across multiple dimensions of model capabilities.

publications.title: m&m's: A Benchmark to Evaluate Tool-Use for multi-step multi-modal Tasks
publications.tldr: A benchmark designed to evaluate how well multimodal models can use tools to solve complex multi-step tasks requiring both visual and textual understanding.
